3.movie_plot: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

127.movie_plot: A group of passengers struggle to survive and escape when their ocean liner completely capsizes at sea.

95.movie_plot: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's turned into one huge lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a river-rafting trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

289.movie_plot: A small-town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

21.movie_plot: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

180.movie_plot: A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

134.movie_plot: Armed with a license to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007, and must defeat a private banker to terrorists in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro, but things are not what they seem.

108.movie_plot: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

124.movie_plot: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

146.movie_plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

54.movie_plot: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

281.movie_plot: The secret to a Stepford wife lies behind the doors of the Men's Association of how women become different and immobilized robots.

101.movie_name: Good, The Bad and The Ugly, The (1966)
101.movie_plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

159.movie_plot: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

32.movie_plot: When a Roman General is betrayed, and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

205.movie_plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

182.movie_plot: Two New Yorkers are accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college, and one of their cousins--an inexperienced, loudmouth lawyer not accustomed to Southern rules and manners--comes in to defend them.

267.movie_plot: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

320.movie_plot: A beautiful but naïve aspiring television personality films a documentary on teenagers with a darker ulterior motive.

310.movie_plot: A young man visiting and helping his uncle in New York City finds himself forced to fight a street gang and the mob with his martial art skills.

271.movie_plot: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his female partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

244.movie_name: So I Married an Axe Murderer (1993)
244.movie_plot: A San Francisco poet who fears commitment suspects his girlfriend may not be who she appears.

89.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

260.movie_plot: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

218.movie_plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

242.movie_name: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof (1958)
242.movie_plot: Brick, an alcoholic ex-football player, drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife, Maggie. His reunion with his father, Big Daddy, who is dying of cancer, jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.

71.movie_plot: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

315.movie_plot: A San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

323.movie_plot: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

240.movie_plot: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination ploy involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by SPECTRE.

116.movie_name: All About My Mother (Todo Sobre Mi Madre) (1999)
116.movie_plot: Young Esteban wants to become a writer and also to discover the identity of his father, carefully concealed by his mother Manuela.

188.movie_plot: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.

166.movie_plot: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.

272.movie_plot: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.
